seamonsters.commands¶

class seamonsters.commands.CommandWrapper(command)[source]¶

Bases: wpilib.command.command.Command

Wraps another command. This is meant to be extended to do useful things.

class seamonsters.commands.EnsureFinishedCommand(command, requiredCount)[source]¶

Bases: seamonsters.commands.CommandWrapper

Waits until isFinished() of the wrapped command returns True for a certain number of steps before finishing.

class seamonsters.commands.ForeverCommand(command)[source]¶

Bases: seamonsters.commands.CommandWrapper
